Title: The Stepford Wives
Actors: Katharine Ross, Paula Prentiss, Peter Masterson, Nanette Newman
Plot: The Stepford Wives is about a small suburb where the women happily go about their housework - cleaning, doing laundry, and cooking gourmet meals - to please their husbands. Unfortunately, Bobbie and Joanna discover that the village's wives have been replaced with robots, and Joanna's husband wants in on the action.
